price: 8. Allaah! Ma jiro ilaah (xaq ah) aan Isaga aheyn, Wuxuu leeyahay Magacyada Wanaagga iyo Quruxda Badan.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
